title: 80/763/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 July 1980 laying down additional provisions concerning statistical surveys of areas under vines
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 8 July 1980  laying down additional provisions concerning statistical surveys of areas under vines  (80/763/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The yield classes referred to in Article 6 (2) of Regulation (EEC) 357/79 shall be those indicated in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
